ok thanks man

Marlboro63@... wrote:            Rees,
   
  Its the same as the 470 hack.  Just cut the mute wire from the board.
   
  jeff
   
    In a message dated 3/28/2008 11:39:23 A.M. Central Daylight Time, reesclarke_69@... writes:
            Great I need to check it out, and can anybody send me the hack for this radio?
   
  Thanks
  Rees

Marlboro63@... wrote:
        Rees,
   
  If you like the 469 you will really like the 12-820.  Its a joggers radio and it is smaller.  It has NO CLICKING on the am band and has a nicer sweep on the fm  than the older 12-470's.  AGain it  works the same as the 12-469 and you will need an external speaker as the antenna.
   
  Jeff
   
    In a message dated 3/28/2008 8:27:56 A.M. Central Daylight Time, reesclarke_69@... writes:
            I like the 12-469, and its super easy to hack.  I hacked the 20-125, its a little harder to hack, and most people in the form is going to recommend this radio, but I just didn't like it.  It has a long antenna and was hard to get reception.  
   
  The 12-469 doesn't have a antenna on the outside, and what you do is hold it in your hand.  Your body acts as the antenna, and that's how I got my best reception.  But this is my opinion, go with your gut feeling, if you get a radio you don't like just take it back to the shack.  Act like nothing is wrong with it, and try the other one.

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
        I am looking at getting either the 12-469 or 20-125. Which would be the best to get for someone who is just starting out. I will be doing the Hack myself with a little help and instructions. I want to get something fairly easy to hack and use for a beginner.
  Thanks
  Kay

Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> wrote:
    Radio Shack FM/AM Radio 12-469 or 20-125

Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> wrote:
        Radio Shack 12-469, 20-125 then you would have to modifiy it.  Some peps here can tell you how to do it, or you can go to ufogeek.com, and watch a video on how to do it.
   
  Rees

I am the founder Of Trinity Paranormal's Western Oregon Chapter. I am

would a person get one??? yeh probly a lame question lol.
